body: The only thing I don't understand is why do we need three levels of indirection (`Tensor -> TensorImpl -> Type`). It seems that everything `Type` does could be handled by `TensorImpl`? Also, a very useful thing in context of e.g. CUDA tensor is that methods called on a tensor object automatically switch the device, but this would mean that you need a per-device type.
